name: Nanomatic
description: Bringing DeFi Stock Options to Crypto. NanoMatic is a deflationary Matic rewards token on the Binance Smart Chain. NanoMatic embellishes a state of the art rewards distributor, offering 10% Matic Rewards on both buys and sells. Nanomatic is building out a Digital Ecosystem where each transaction will distribute rewards to holders. The Ecosystem items that are in the works are NanoBites, NanoShop, OptDex dApp, and NanoPlace. A version 1 of the swap is already completed. The token will serve as the form of currency of OptDex, a revolutionary DeFi Cryptocurrency Options trading platform slated to be released in late 2023.
